summary: Black Bolt re textured Nightingale Armour
descriptionHtml:
Armor is standalone! No longer replaces Nightingale; now called 'Black Bolt'.
Feel free to rename, as the set is unenchanted.
All four pieces can only be crafted at the SkyForge ith Leather & Leather Strips.
All four pieces can be improved at a Workbench with said materials.

**************************************************
Description:This is a Black and white variant of the Nightingale armor set based on Black Bolt's Costume utilizing the Capeless Varient meshes.

(Huge thanks to Gilead Maerlyn for their work on the Capeless Variant, respectively.)
**************************************************
This is for Male Only.

**************************************************

Installation:
Simply extract the archive into the Skyrim folder, so the .esp, textures folder, and meshes folder all land into your skyrim/data directory.
Typically:
C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim

C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim


Credits:
Gilead Maerlyn for his work and knowledge on transparencies. If you don't like anything hanging from the back, consider his Capeless Nightingale mod:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1560
author: wanoo99
